description:
Next Porto.Data meetup we will be dedicated to an Overview of SQL Server Server 2019 and we are happy to have an expert to talk about it.

Our invited speaker, Ivan Campos (https://twitter.com/WizardDBA) counts with more than 10 years of experience, he's the founder of Porto.Data community, one of the organizers of SQLSaturday Porto event in Portugal, MVP, and has a great passion about data and community.

Agenda
• Welcome
• "SQL Server 2019 (Overview) What's new in the Database Engine" by
Ivan Campos
• Coffee break & networking
• Closing

After the event we invite everyone to join us for a coffee break.
name: Porto.Data #49 SQL Server 2019 (Overview) What's new in the Database Engine
